item.title: Learning how to edit specs and what not
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

[code] public void DDSSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14484) {
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(31);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(31);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14484) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(31);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(0x426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;

[/code]

A few questions.
First, How do I make it 4 hit?
And is the Max hit 31?

Read full topic
item.source: Learning how to edit specs and what not
